## Introduction to R and RStudio

### Challenge 1

What is the variable after each statement in the following program?

```{r challenge_1}

mass <- 47.5
age <- 122
mass <- mass * 2.3
age <- age - 20
```

### Challenge 2

Which is larger, mass or age?
